lines: 1. Kero kia botuko gati,Malaik' agatera,Ogotera Kw'Obonene,'Makan'echahabu;'Morembe n'obuy'as'ense,Korw'ase Nyasae,Ense egakira eigwe,Malaik' agotera.
2. Naende abande bagacha,'Maganda ya Igoro,'Gotera okwo gokaigweka,'b'ense yarosire;Igoro y'ebitii ebio,Bakairurukao,'Riogi riabo nikaigwekaas'ens'ey'embe.
3. 'Ba more inse y'egurube,'Ba mwaisire gokwa,Mwechandete as'enchera,Y'emechand'emenge;Rora engaki y'obuya,Ngoch'er 'as' obwango,Timok'as'encher' ensemo,Moigwe bagotera.
